name: Canadian Rockies Trail Guide 9th Edition
description: Originally published in 1971, this was one of the first hiking guides for the Canadian Rockies region. It’s been revised and updated many times, and the 9th edition has 229 hikes and routes, plus dozens of side trips. Explore Banff, Jasper, Yoho, Kootenay, and Waterton Lakes national parks, and multiple provincial parks. Includes maps, photographs, GPS coordinates for trailheads, and accurate distances (trail logs were measured by a trail wheel).
